gaming.name: Neo Lottery
gaming.description: Experience the thrill of provably fair lottery draws powered by VRF randomness. Buy tickets with GAS and compete for massive jackpots with 100% transparent on-chain verification.
gaming.description_zh: 体验由 VRF 随机数驱动的公平彩票抽奖。使用 GAS 购买彩票，竞争巨额奖池，100% 链上透明验证。

gaming.name: Coin Flip
gaming.description: Classic 50/50 betting reimagined on blockchain. Flip a coin, double your GAS instantly with cryptographically secure randomness ensuring fair outcomes every time.
gaming.description_zh: 经典 50/50 投注在区块链上重新演绎。抛硬币，使用加密安全随机数确保每次公平结果，即时翻倍您的 GAS。

gaming.name: Dice Game
gaming.description: Roll the dice and test your luck! Choose your winning range, place your bet, and watch the VRF-powered dice determine your fate with verifiable fairness.
gaming.description_zh: 掷骰子测试您的运气！选择获胜范围，下注，观看 VRF 驱动的骰子以可验证的公平性决定您的命运。

gaming.name: Scratch Card
gaming.description: Instant gratification meets blockchain gaming. Scratch virtual cards to reveal prizes instantly, with every outcome cryptographically guaranteed and transparent.
gaming.description_zh: 即时赢取奖励的数字刮刮卡。刮开揭示您的奖品，奖励即时发放到您的钱包。

gaming.name: Secret Poker
gaming.description: Play Texas Hold'em with true card privacy using zero-knowledge proofs. Your hand stays secret until showdown, eliminating cheating while preserving the poker experience.
gaming.description_zh: 使用零知识证明的隐私扑克游戏。您的手牌保密，同时确保游戏公平。

gaming.name: Neo Crash
gaming.description: Watch the multiplier climb and cash out before it crashes! This adrenaline-pumping game tests your nerve with real-time multipliers and instant payouts.
gaming.description_zh: 刺激的倍数游戏。观看倍数上升，在崩盘前及时提现！

gaming.name: Crypto Riddle
gaming.description: Crack cryptographic riddles and brain teasers to unlock GAS rewards. Daily challenges test your wit with puzzles ranging from ciphers to logic problems.
gaming.description_zh: 破解密码谜题和脑筋急转弯，解锁 GAS 奖励。

gaming.name: Million Piece Map
gaming.description: Own and customize pixels on a massive collaborative canvas. Create art, advertise, or stake your claim on this permanent blockchain masterpiece.
gaming.description_zh: 在大型协作画布上拥有和自定义像素。

defi.name: Neo Swap
defi.description: Swap NEO and GAS instantly via Flamingo DEX. Simple interface for quick token exchanges with real-time rates.
defi.description_zh: 去中心化代币兑换。即时交换 NEO 生态系统中的代币，享受最优价格。

defi.name: Flash Loan
defi.description: Access instant uncollateralized loans that must be repaid within a single transaction. Perfect for arbitrage, liquidations, and complex DeFi strategies.
defi.description_zh: 无抵押即时借贷。在单笔交易内借入、使用、归还，实现套利和清算。

defi.name: Compound Capsule
defi.description: Maximize your yields with automatic compounding. Deposit once and watch your earnings grow exponentially as rewards are reinvested continuously.
defi.description_zh: 通过自动复投最大化您的收益。

defi.name: Self Loan
defi.description: Borrow against your own collateral with zero liquidation risk. Lock your assets, borrow up to 50%, and repay on your own schedule.
defi.description_zh: 用自己的抵押品借款，零清算风险。

defi.name: NeoBurger
defi.description: Stake NEO to earn GAS rewards with liquid staking. Receive bNEO tokens representing your staked NEO, allowing you to earn staking rewards while maintaining liquidity for DeFi activities.
defi.description_zh: Neo 质押聚合器。质押 NEO 获取 bNEO，自动复投最大化收益。

defi.name: Gas Sponsor
defi.description: Sponsor GAS fees for other users or get your transactions sponsored. Enable gasless transactions for your dApp users with a decentralized gas sponsorship marketplace.
defi.description_zh: 为其他用户赞助 GAS 费用或获得交易赞助。通过去中心化的 GAS 赞助市场为您的 dApp 用户启用无 GAS 交易。

social.name: GrantShare
social.description: Create and fund community grants with transparent on-chain tracking. Support open-source projects, education initiatives, and community development.
social.description_zh: 创建和资助社区资助项目，链上透明追踪。

social.name: Red Envelope
social.description: Share the joy of giving with digital red envelopes! Send lucky GAS gifts to friends and groups with randomized amounts, perfect for celebrations and holidays.
social.description_zh: 发送幸运 GAS 红包给朋友。创建红包，分享链接，让朋友们抢红包！

social.name: Dev Tipping
social.description: Support open-source developers directly! Tip contributors for their work on GitHub repos, Stack Overflow answers, or any valuable code contribution.
social.description_zh: 直接支持开源开发者，为他们的贡献打赏。

social.name: Breakup Contract
social.description: Create immutable relationship agreements on-chain. Define terms for shared assets, responsibilities, and exit conditions with smart contract enforcement.
social.description_zh: 在链上创建不可变的关系协议，智能合约执行。

nft.name: Canvas
nft.description: Create collaborative NFT art with other artists in real-time. Each contribution is recorded on-chain, and the final piece is minted as a shared NFT.
nft.description_zh: 链上协作像素画布。每个像素都是 NFT，与全球用户一起创作艺术。

nft.name: On-Chain Tarot
nft.description: Receive mystical tarot readings powered by VRF randomness. Each reading is minted as a unique NFT capturing your fortune at that moment in time.
nft.description_zh: 接收由 VRF 随机数驱动的神秘塔罗牌占卜。

nft.name: Time Capsule
nft.description: Lock messages, media, or assets in blockchain time capsules that unlock at a future date. Create digital legacies, schedule surprises, or preserve memories for future generations.
nft.description_zh: 锁定消息或资产，在未来日期解锁。

nft.name: Heritage Trust
nft.description: Create smart inheritance plans that automatically transfer your digital assets to beneficiaries. Set conditions, add trustees, and ensure your crypto legacy passes on securely.
nft.description_zh: 创建智能继承计划，自动转移资产。

nft.name: Garden of Neo
nft.description: Cultivate your own virtual garden where plants grow based on your blockchain activity. Rare seeds, seasonal events, and cross-pollination create unique botanical NFTs.
nft.description_zh: 培育虚拟花园，植物根据区块链活动生长。

nft.name: Graveyard
nft.description: Create permanent digital memorials for loved ones, pets, or even failed crypto projects. Mint tombstone NFTs with epitaphs, photos, and memories that live forever on-chain.
nft.description_zh: 创建永久的数字纪念碑作为墓碑 NFT。

governance.name: Gov Booster
governance.description: Amplify your governance power through staking and delegation. Lock tokens for boosted voting weight, delegate to trusted representatives, and maximize your protocol influence.
governance.description_zh: 通过质押和委托放大您的治理权力。

governance.name: Burn League
governance.description: Compete in token burning competitions where communities race to reduce supply. Climb leaderboards, earn burn badges, and prove your commitment to deflation.
governance.description_zh: 参与代币销毁竞赛，减少供应量。

governance.name: Doomsday Clock
governance.description: A community-controlled countdown that resets when people contribute. If it hits zero, locked funds redistribute. Keep the clock alive or watch it all burn.
governance.description_zh: 社区控制的倒计时，有人贡献时重置。

governance.name: Masquerade DAO
governance.description: Participate in governance wearing a digital mask. Propose and vote anonymously while still proving membership, enabling honest discourse without social pressure.
governance.description_zh: 戴着数字面具匿名参与治理。

governance.name: Gov Merc
governance.description: Hire governance mercenaries to vote on your behalf or sell your voting power to the highest bidder. A marketplace for delegation and influence in the DAO ecosystem.
governance.description_zh: 雇佣治理雇佣兵或出售您的投票权。

governance.name: Candidate Vote
governance.description: Vote for platform candidates and earn GAS rewards. Participate in governance by staking your tokens and supporting your preferred candidates with transparent on-chain voting.
governance.description_zh: 为 Neo 共识节点候选人投票。参与网络治理，支持您信任的节点。

governance.name: Council Governance
governance.description: Create and vote on governance proposals as a council member. Submit text proposals or policy parameter changes, collect signatures, and execute approved decisions with multi-sig verification.
governance.description_zh: 作为议会成员创建和投票治理提案。提交文本提案或策略参数变更，收集签名，执行已批准的决议。

utility.name: Neo Name Service
utility.description: Register and manage human-readable .neo domain names for your wallet. Search availability, register domains, and manage your digital identity on Neo.
utility.description_zh: 为您的钱包注册人类可读的 .neo 域名。

utility.name: Neo Explorer
utility.description: Explore the Neo N3 blockchain with real-time stats for both Mainnet and Testnet. Search transactions, addresses, and contracts with detailed execution traces.
utility.description_zh: 探索 Neo 区块链。查看交易、区块、地址和智能合约详情。

utility.name: Guardian Policy
utility.description: Define and enforce smart contract policies for your wallet. Set spending limits, whitelist addresses, require multi-sig for large transfers, and protect your assets.
utility.description_zh: 为您的钱包定义和执行智能合约策略。

utility.name: Unbreakable Vault
utility.description: Store your most valuable assets in a time-locked vault with multiple security layers. Social recovery, hardware key support, and customizable unlock conditions.
utility.description_zh: 在多层安全的时间锁定保险库中存储贵重资产。

utility.name: Neo Treasury
utility.description: Track Neo co-founders Da Hongfei and Erik Zhang's wallet holdings in real-time. View NEO and GAS balances across 44 treasury addresses with live price data.
utility.description_zh: 实时追踪 Neo 联合创始人达鸿飞和张铮文的钱包持有量。查看 44 个国库地址的 NEO 和 GAS 余额及实时价格。

utility.name: Daily Check-in
utility.description: Check in daily to build your streak and earn GAS rewards. Complete 7 consecutive days for 1 GAS, then earn 1.5 GAS for every additional 7 days. Miss a day and start over!
utility.description_zh: 每日签到累积连续天数赚取 GAS 奖励。连续7天获得1 GAS，之后每7天额外获得1.5 GAS。错过一天重新开始！
